Room.Name: Milsene K'tral Desert Exhibit
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the southernmost exhibit of the fantastic Milsene Museum.
Room.LongDescription: This place gets stranger and stranger. There's a lot of sand in here and the sun blazes down from an open ceiling. A small signpost says "Welcome to the Unexplored Domain of K'tral". K'tral is the desert valley hidden deep within the mountains with supposedly fantastic riches and deadly monsters, like sandworms.
